Token Transfer

Enables new business models, such as micropayments and asset transfers
Tamper protected transaction history
Increased control over access to personal data and secured information
Simple and fast transaction processes
Automated validation from pre-verified KYC data
Pre-installed application that enables asset tokenization, creation of digital wallets, and token transfers between users on the blockchain.

Use cases

Land registry

Vehicle registry

Supply chain management

Attestation

Certificate Issuance

Business License Issuance

Birth Certificates

Voting

Token Transfer
